summary: Looks at the arguments for capitalism and technology, such as greater efficiency, more time and less work, and argues that these are not being fulfilled, and they never will be.
cast: John Zerzan|George W. Bush|Fidel Castro|Kalle Lasn|Matt McMullen|Steve Ballmer|Tania|Mirta Muniz|Svante Tidholm
title: Surplus: Terrorized Into Being Consumers
